name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser to Browser share text data

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily exchange text data (ex: URL, email address etc) to another chrome browser (Friends's browser)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily share text data between two different chrome browsers. Eg : Send a URL or any other paragraph to your friend's Chrome browser using this extension
